title: For the JYP online audition, do I use the instrumental audio and sing, or do I just sing without any music? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you’re going to be singing a very similar rendition of the song (bc of similarities in tone and vocal ability) and you find it compliments your voice, go for it as long as you can balance it in your submission video (ie: it isn’t too loud or too quiet). If you find you can’t balance your voice to instrumental, you have an extremely powerful voice, or you’re going to be singing a more stylized version, I would recommend just using your vocals. Good luck!

I will suggest you that first stand in front of a mirror and sing a song that you have prepared and record it. After listening your own song, if you think that it is good than sing without music and if you think that you will need musical instruments than you can have one.
